# Chapter 7: Manage and Analyze Geodata

## Learning Objectives

After studying this chapter you should be able to:

-   Understand sources of input data and GIS data types
-   Create a QGIS project and navigate through QGIS
-   Change the Coordinate Reference System (CRS) in QGIS
-   Changing symbology in QGIS
-   Use attribute tables in QGIS
-   Create maps in QGIS
